amendment.description: Amendment allows churches and civic organizations to display signs that are larger than 8 square feet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce subpart B of part 750 of title 23, Code of Federal Regulations, regarding signs for service clubs and religious notices as defined in section 153(p) of such part.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Mullin.
